SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view

Class ViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.ViewController
public class ViewController extends Object
This class is responsible for controlling the view of the application. It manages the current stage, scene, and view, as well as the connection type and client handler.

  • Method Details

    • setUpStage

      public static void setUpStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader fxmlLoader) throws IOException
      Sets up the stage with the given stage and FXMLLoader. If a stage is already set, it is closed before the new stage is set up (for server down case).
      Parameters:
      stage - The stage to set up.
      fxmlLoader - The FXMLLoader to use to load the scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • setConnectionType

      public static void setConnectionType(ConnectionType connectionType)
      Sets the connection type of the client.
      Parameters:
      connectionType - The connection type to set.

    • getConnection

      public static ConnectionType getConnection()
      Returns:
      The connection type of the client.

    • changeScene

      public static void changeScene(javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader fxmlLoader, String title) throws IOException
      Changes the scene of the application to the scene loaded by the given FXMLLoader. The title of the stage is also updated.
      Parameters:
      fxmlLoader - The FXMLLoader to use to load the scene.
      title - The title to set for the stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • getClientView

      public static ClientView getClientView()
      Returns:
      The current view of the client.

    • setClientView

      public static void setClientView(ClientView clientView)
      Parameters:
      clientView - The view to set.

    • setClientHandler

      public static void setClientHandler(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - The client handler to set.

    • getClientHandler

      public static ClientHandler getClientHandler()
      Returns:
      The client handler for the client.

    • serverdown

      public static void serverdown()
      Handles a server down event. This method is called when the server goes down. It sets up a new stage with the welcome view.
